content.text: 0) To Make Glaze: In a medium bowl combine the ketchup, pineapple juice, molasses, rum, mustard and garlic.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "combine"@35:42 / AC
		:subtask ( purp-0-0 "To Make Glaze"@3:16 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the ketchup"@43:54 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "pineapple juice"@56:71 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "molasses"@73:81 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "rum"@83:86 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "mustard"@88:95 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "garlic"@100:106 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a medium bowl"@21:34 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Season with salt and pepper to taste and mix well.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Season"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "salt and pepper"@15:30 / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-1-0 "to taste and mix well"@31:52 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Place chicken pieces in a lightly oiled 9x13 inch baking dish; brush both sides with prepared glaze, using about 1/2 of the glaze.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-7 "chicken pieces"@9:23 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-2-0 "a lightly oiled 9x13 inch baking dish"@27:64 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "brush"@66:71 / AC
		:mnr ( "using about 1/2 of the glaze"@104:132 / OTHER )
		:gol ( "both sides"@72:82 / OTHER )
		:ppt ( "prepared glaze"@88:102 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Cover dish and refrigerate to marinate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Cover"@3:8 / AC
		:gol ( tool-3-0 "dish"@9:13 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "refrigerate"@18:29 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-3-0 "to marinate"@30:41 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-3-0 "at least 2 hours"@46:62 / DUR )
		:duration ( dur-3-1 "overnight"@66:75 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Preheat oven to 375  degrees F (190 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-5-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-5-0 "375  degrees F"@19:33 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-5-1 "190 degrees C"@35:48 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Lightly brush chicken pieces on one side with some of the reserved glaze and bake uncovered in preheated oven for about 25 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "brush"@11:16 / AC
		:gol ( "chicken pieces"@17:31 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "some of the reserved glaze"@49:75 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( "one side"@35:43 / OTHER )
	:inform ( ac-6-1 "bake"@80:84 / AC
		:loc ( tool-6-0 "preheated oven"@98:112 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-6-0 "25 minutes"@123:133 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Turn pieces, brush with remaining glaze and bake for another 25 minutes or until chicken is tender.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Turn"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( "pieces"@8:14 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-7-1 "brush"@16:21 / AC
		:ppt ( "remaining glaze"@27:42 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-7-2 "bake"@47:51 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "another 25 minutes"@56:74 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-7-0 "until chicken is tender"@78:101 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 9) Put chicken under broiler and lightly brown on both sides, about 2 to 3 minutes each side.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Put"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( "chicken"@7:14 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-9-0 "broiler"@21:28 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-9-1 "brown"@41:46 / AC
		:duration ( dur-9-0 "2 to 3 minutes each side"@68:92 / DUR )
		:loc ( "both sides"@50:60 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
